sentences.sContent: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.sCn: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.sContent: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.sCn: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.sContent: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.sCn: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

trans.tranOther: a job or profession that you have been trained for, and which you do for a long period of your life
